justification: Participants responded to the question “to what extent is the human responsible for not reaching on time?” using "two continuous sliders ranging from 0 ('Not at all') to 100 ('Very much')."

For the AI, the identical question format was used—“to what extent is the AI responsible for not reaching on time?”—and participants again answered with "two continuous sliders ranging from 0 ('Not at all') to 100 ('Very much')."
